definition[0]: wise and careful use of money, so that none is wasted
definition[1]: in the US, a SAVINGS AND LOAN ASSOCIATION or SAVINGS BANK
example[0]: Before it collapsed, it was the 12th largest thrift in Texas.
definition[2]: wise and careful use of money, especially when this involves saving money for the future
example[1]: Savings banks spread new ideas about independence and thrift.
